name: fast-api-next
description: AI-powered fullstack application with FastAPI and Next.js

scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd frontend && pnpm install && cd ../backend && python3.11 -m venv venv && ./venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:makemigrations: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && alembic revision --autogenerate -m
